data.description: Fluke is hiring a Research Engineering Intern for summer 2026! The ideal candidate for this role will specialize in electrical engineering, optics, or physics. This intern will conduct a targeted development or research project to develop an optical calibration system or characterize new sensing technology (depending on business priority in summer 2026). Responsibilities: - Use foundational engineering (electrical and mechanical) and optics physics principles to construct a testable hypothesis and experiment plan and/or system design supporting a Fluke area of interest. - Work with a senior team of engineers and researchers to create an work plan, build and refine a prototype and conduct test measurements. - Use sound engineering principles and experiment practices to execute experiments, document and interpret results. - Work with the senior team to review approaches and plan as well as results and interpretation. - Conduct literature reviews as needed. - Design and build ex...
